mapper.select: SELECT def_error_log.ID, CONTENT, APP_PLATFORM, def_error_log.CORP_CODE, VERSION, def_error_log.created_date, def_error_log.creater, modified_date, modifier, def_error_log.ISACTIVE FROM def_error_log WHERE def_error_log.id=#{id}

SELECT def_error_log.id, content, app_platform, corp_code, version, def_error_log.CREATED_DATE, def_error_log.CREATER, def_error_log.MODIFIED_DATE, def_error_log.MODIFIER, def_error_log.ISACTIVE from def_error_log WHERE 1=1
AND (def_error_log.APP_PLATFORM like concat('%',#{search_value},'%') OR def_error_log.CORP_CODE like concat('%',#{search_value},'%') OR def_error_log.VERSION like concat('%',#{search_value},'%') )
ORDER BY def_error_log.id DESC

SELECT def_error_log.* FROM def_error_log WHERE
def_error_log.${entryKey} LIKE concat('%',#{entryValue},'%')
1=1
ORDER BY def_error_log.id DESC
